org.pimslims.business.crystallization.model
Class SampleVolumeMap

java.lang.Object
  org.pimslims.business.crystallization.model.VolumeMap
      org.pimslims.business.crystallization.model.SampleVolumeMap

public class SampleVolumeMap
    
extends VolumeMap





Class to describe the volume of a Sample in a set of WellCondition. Any
WellCondition that have not been explicitly set will return VolumeMap.ZERO_VOLUME.







    
Author:

    
Jon Diprose
